This functionality must be implemented in model in FastWpfGrid.

One possible way to achieve this is following:
The model should return number of rows, which is actually loaded, when user scrolls to last N rows (GetCell() or GetRowHeader() method for last N rows is called), model should load next M rows. If there are no next rows available, models marks it so that no furher read is done.
